name: Doge's Revenge
description:
Warning: The music is pretty loud and there's no volume control. Sorry about that.

Downloadable version has better performance and doesn't suffer from focus loss compared to browser version.

    Keys:

WASD: moving

Shift: Walk

Space: jump

Mouse: aiming

Left mouse button: shooting

Right mouse button: melee

P: Pause/menu

E: Interact with objects

    Note:

Many features and assets are missing. There are no sound effects, not many things to buy from the shop, some animations are missing and the villain is entirely invisible. Do not be alarmed.

   Credits:

  • Jarppi: Programming
  • Tarmodev: UI programming
  • Aleksi Pekkala: Ship and item modeling, menu art, concepts
  • Allylix: Environment modeling & texturing, concepts
  • Knowko: Enemy modeling, promo & title art, concepts
  • Nenko: Music
  • Spazi:  A bit of everything

    Walkthrough:

Activate the big grey machines with E key to progress. 5 must be activated to open a portal in the central island to the final zone. To access most of the islands you need the double jump upgrade which costs 100. It can be bought from the orange computer terminals such as the one on the crashed space ship and those scattered around the islands. Using the shop pauses the game so you're safe to buy ammo in a fight. If you run out of coins, your best option is to restart from a checkpoint using the pause menu ("P" key) so enemies will respawn. In the final zone beyond the portal awaits you a bossfight. The boss cannot be damaged when it's surrounded by a blue shield and when its health bar is dimly colored. If you run out of ammo, you can fight the robots that appear using your melee to get coins. There's a shop terminal in the final zone which you can use to buy ammo. After destroying the boss, the game should end in a few seconds.
